definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The Principles of Scientific Management by Frederick Winslow Taylor has been considered the origin of modem management thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 泰罗的科学管理原理被认为是现代管理思想的起源。

sentences.english: This has been confirmed in scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 这一论断在科学管理中得到了确证。

sentences.english: It is not part of scientific management to drive anyone.
sentences.chinese: 科学管理中并不包含驱使人们工作的成分。

sentences.english: She confines her remarks to scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 她所讲的话仅局限于科学管理问题。

sentences.english: Insist to treat according to law sternly Jing, establishment the mechanism of scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 坚持依法从严治警，建立科学管理机制等。

sentences.english: She confines her remarks to scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 她所讲的仅限于科学管理问题。

sentences.english: Scientific management and a solid work is the successful completion of the tasks of protection.
sentences.chinese: 科学管理和扎实工作是顺利完成各项任务的保障。

sentences.english: While there, he started the first scientifically managed forest in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，他开始了在美国的第一个科学管理的森林。

sentences.english: The key of guard countermeasure in accident of safety for vehicle rolling ship is a scientific administration.
sentences.chinese: 川江汽车滚装船安全事故防范的关键是科学管理。

sentences.english: The professor confined his remarks to scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 那位教授把自己的讲话局限在科学管理方面。

sentences.english: Hence, we must develop and standardize mass organizations in China energetically.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必须大力发展和科学管理我国的社团组织。

sentences.english: "Scientific Management and Quality Service" is always our unchangeable policy and highest objective.
sentences.chinese: 科学管理合优质服务是公司的不变的宗旨和最终目标。

sentences.english: It is the only way to train undergraduates' scientific management ability.
sentences.chinese: 大学生科学管理能力培养必须走“兵团群英”之路。

sentences.english: All of these have an important meaning for a hospital's development and management.
sentences.chinese: 这对医院的医疗发展和科学管理有着重要意义。

definition: an overall plan taking into account all factors
to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
